title: This Game Is More Addicting Than Actual Gambling!?

media:group.media:title: This Game Is More Addicting Than Actual Gambling!?
media:group.media:description:
Vampire Survivors is a roguelike video game developed and published by Luca Galante.

It costs three dollars. It was made by one person. And it is the most addicting game I’ve ever played. This is the story of an indie game that was made by a software developer who worked in the gambling industry. It’s got flashing lights. It’s got RNG rolls. It has no business being as good as it is, yet I find myself coming back every single night for one more hit. 

This is Vampire Survivors.
